issues.info: Report issues to the issue tracker on GitHub or to yedel on discord

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.description: A general toggle for the mod.

demon-mode.name: Demon Mode
demon-mode.description: Only hide the demon difficulties of demon levels.

add-reveal-button.name: Add Reveal Button
add-reveal-button.description: Adds a button to the left of the screen to reveal the difficulty information of a level.

hide-in-level-cells.name: Hide in Level Cells
hide-in-level-cells.description: Hide difficulty information in level cells, found when searching and finding level previews.

hide-in-level-screens.name: Hide in Level Screens
hide-in-level-screens.description: Hide difficulty information while in level screens.

only-hide-rated-levels.name: Only Hide Rated Levels
only-hide-rated-levels.description: Only hide the difficulty information of rated levels.

only-hide-uncompleted-levels.name: Only Hide Uncompleted Levels
only-hide-uncompleted-levels.description: Only hide the difficulty information of uncompleted levels.

dont-hide-auto-levels.name: Don't Hide Auto Levels
dont-hide-auto-levels.description: Don't hide the difficulty information of auto levels.

hide-difficulty.name: Hide Difficulty
hide-difficulty.description: Hides the standard difficulty (easy, hard, demon) of levels.

hide-rate-demon-button.name: Hide Rate Demon Button
hide-rate-demon-button.description: Hides the rate demon button on hidden demon levels.

hide-orbs.name: Hide Orbs
hide-orbs.description: Hides the max orbs of levels.

hidden-text-replacement.name: Hidden Text Replacement
hidden-text-replacement.description: The text to use for replacing star/orb numbers.
